top_comments.comment: The food is not worse in England

comments_since_last_sample.body: Can we sue the Republican Party for exposing us to nameless?

Wow
 Ari, you made the hairs on the back of my neck stand up  with that last piece from Martin Luther King. As you were getting  across   he could have been with us right this second. Whata great piece of journalism  you have just show piece. Thank you.
God giveth and God can take away
Julius Jones murdered Paul Howell in front of his children.
I don't think the late and great Martin Luther King would approve of what's going on now a days.
Only sheep believe anything the main stream media peddle. Do your Own research.
DemicRats quit trying to cancel truth and freedom.

The comparison between US and English law was interesting - but, I would suggest unbalanced. It is true that under English law if you make a statement, you can be sued for libel\slander - and then the burden of proof that the statement was true lies with the defendant. Simply saying that "you believe the statement to be true" or that "your friend believes this to be true" is not enough - nor, in my opinion, should it be. You must show t to be true. - The alternative, again in my opinion, is the situation you have in the US where the "Big Lie" is so easily propagated and is in danger of destroying your democracy.

 Furthermore, using the Big Lie to pass voter restriction rights - plus partisan gerrymandering (neither of which would be possible in the UK - risks burying the truth  - and your democracy - under an avalanche of lies.

As a final point, with regard to your comments concerning English food. When was the last time you visited? Is this your opinion based on experience - or are you merely repeating "opinions" of other "armchair" critics? - I have travelled the world, live in Italy - have experienced food in America - and I can tell you unequivocally that the food in the UK is far better than in the US. (So when you say something is a "fact", please check your "facts" first.)
These people suing for the sake of it, because they have enough money either from financial backers of their own resources, it doesn’t matter if they lose?
The food is not worse in England
Putin and his oligarchs  have purchased Great Britain by the pound Thanks to the Mercer’s Boris and Brexit
We are starting to operate like Nazi Germany in our media and politics.
Does Trump ever get tired of wasting money on legal fees for ridiculous lawsuits?  No wonder he went bankrupt so many times.
"lets go brandon" comments sounds like lets go Joe Biden rather than what it really means, just saying!
